string-array.name: onBoardingPagerDescription
string-array.item: Turing ToDo is a beautifully simple,free todo list,task list and reminder app that will help keep your busy life organised everday
Tasks is a simple to do list application that emphasizes simplicity and ease of use. Tasks are built for you if you want to have a shopping list, grocery list or just a lot of things to remember
If you have a feature that you want, or if you encounter a problem to resolve, please email me and we will be happy to help
